captions.text:
This isn't some pro-GOP election, it's an
anti-Obama election
We asked you for questions for the panel
and we got this on facebook
Everybody wants to bang the president
Bang the president, make him squeal
All of you want to go out and bang the president
We have to be true, we have to be great
We have to bang the president every day
The, uh, you don't want it all in just one big bang

I would enjoy havin some bourbon with Mitch
McConnel
I don't know what his preferred drink is
The president would like to know your preferred drink
and is unlike other types of beverages

I rise to take an active role in promoting
bourbon
The drink itself is named for Bourbon County,
What set off rumors of Baghdadi's injury?
It turns out it was a tweet, a tweet
This tweet we've seen, this tweet could be
The tweet that made us think he was dead
Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, Abu Bakr al-
But right now nothing has happened
are taking people away from reality
Creating phony worlds in which they can escape

Yeah, the machines and the humans in love
forever
Like you and me on TV bein angry together,

I'll always be there for you when you've got
some yellin to dooo
Then people watch it on their machines

Aren't the president and Eric Holder responsible
for violence in Ferguson
Yup, yeah, yes, yes, yes, yeah
Yeah, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes
Or the long history of institutional discriminatio--
I wanna pay tribute to the spirit of Kentucky
Buy him dinner! Take him home!
If you're both in the mood when you're alone
Share this video with your friends on the internet
We'll need your help then more than ever because
we can only find so much news on our own
Make sure to subscribe, or don't
Because, after all, you are probably a human
and have the power of free will
Everything sounds better in perfect tune

title: Bang The President - Songify the News #5

comments.text:
Recently I was watching news reports about the guy that flew a gyrocopter 
onto the White House lawn. NBC interviewed his family and the criminal 
which had his views, reasoning, concerns and beliefs. Fox News called him a 
knucklehead twice as well as another name I can't recall (twice) then 
interviewed a gyrocopter instructor and a reporter. I can't help but feel 
like Fox News should have news in quotations.

I can accept both side's views on bias but on this particular case but I 
can't help but feel Fox didn't report the whole story because of their 
political interests. Again, you can say the same for both. I'm just saying 
on that particular story it is clear- The pilot's goal was to reduce 
spending in presidential elections. Fox did not forget to include this 
fact, they purposefully omitted this fact in order to insult and discredit 
not only him but the entire idea of restricted spending on presidential 
candidate spending.

Edit: Punctuation errors and I hope you can forgive the rest of the 
grammatical errors. I don't mean to start a flame war. If anything please 
don't respond to this but possibly take this into consideration- all media 
has a personal and political bias and maybe before solidifying an opinion 
that you could look at all the sides of an argument and base your opinion 
off of that.

TL;DR: Fox raked gyrocopter guy over the coals and ignored any concerns 
with the government he had which was unfair considering his reasonable 
complaints. That being said- I do not condone any activity that violates 
federal law.

Edit: Almost forgot what video I'm on. Seriously don't respond to this. 
Live long and prosper. May the force be with you. I hope whatever deity you 
believe in is responsive. Just remember to be respectful. This video is 
awesome regardless and we should all drink to that!﻿
